query: SELECT MONTH(dataVenda) as mes, SUM(valorTotal) as totalBruto FROM vendas WHERE YEAR(dataVenda) = 2025 AND excluido = 0 GROUP BY MONTH(dataVenda) ORDER BY MONTH(dataVenda) LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT MONTH(dataVenda) as mes, SUM(valorTotal) as totalBruto FROM vendas WHERE YEAR(dataVenda) = 2025 AND excluido = 0 GROUP BY MONTH(dataVenda) ORDER BY MONTH(dataVenda) LIMIT 5;
